query.sql: SELECT df.table_application_id, df.descriptive_flexfield_name, dft.description dff_description, df.application_table_name, dfct.descriptive_flex_context_code, dfct.description context_description FROM apps.fnd_descriptive_flexs df JOIN apps.FND_DESCRIPTIVE_FLEXS_TL dft on 1 = 1 and dft.application_id = df.application_id and dft.descriptive_flexfield_name = df.descriptive_flexfield_name and dft.language = 'RU' join apps.fnd_descr_flex_contexts_tl dfct on 1 = 1 and dfct.descriptive_flexfield_name = df.descriptive_flexfield_name and dfct.language = 'RU' WHERE 1 = 1 and df.application_table_name = upper(:P_TABLE_NAME) order by df.descriptive_flexfield_name, decode( dfct.descriptive_flex_context_code, 'Global Data Elements', null, dfct.descriptive_flex_context_code ) nulls first

select dfcu.application_Column_name, dfcu.column_seq_num, dfcu.end_user_column_name, dfcut.description, dfcut.form_left_prompt, dfcut.form_above_prompt, dfcu.enabled_Flag, dfcu.required_Flag, dfcu.display_Flag, dfcu.default_value, dfcu.flex_Value_Set_id, fvs.flex_Value_Set_name, fvs.description flex_Value_Set_description, fvt.application_table_name fvt_application_table_name, fvt.value_column_name, fvt.id_column_name, fvt.meaning_column_name, fvt.additional_where_clause from apps.fnd_descriptive_flexs df left join apps.fnd_descr_flex_column_usages dfcu on 1 = 1 and dfcu.application_id = df.application_id and dfcu.descriptive_flexfield_name = df.descriptive_flexfield_name left join apps.fnd_descr_flex_col_usage_tl dfcut on 1 = 1 and dfcut.application_id = dfcu.application_id and dfcut.descriptive_flexfield_name = dfcu.descriptive_flexfield_name and dfcut.descriptive_flex_context_code = dfcu.descriptive_flex_context_code and dfcut.application_column_name = dfcu.application_column_name left join apps.fnd_Flex_value_sets fvs on 1 = 1 and apps.fvs.flex_value_set_id = dfcu.flex_Value_Set_id left join apps.fnd_flex_Validation_tables fvt on 1 = 1 -- dynamic sql chunks use and fvs.flex_Value_Set_id = fvt.flex_Value_set_id where 1 = 1 and df.table_application_id = :TABLE_APPLICATION_ID and df.application_Table_name = :APPLICATION_TABLE_NAME and df.descriptive_flexfield_name = :DESCRIPTIVE_FLEXFIELD_NAME and DFCU.descriptive_flex_context_code = :DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_CODE and dfcut.language = 'RU' order by dfcu.column_seq_num
